page.title: 12LIFE STYLE DONNA AGE 11 YRS.
page.content: IN THE MORNING I GET UP AT 8.00 A.M. GET DRESSED AND HAVE MY BREAKFAST. THEN I HAVE A WASH AND BRUSH MY TEETH AND BRUSH MY HAIR.AT 8.40 A.M. I LEAVE FOR SCHOOL. WHEN I GET TO SCHOOL I GO OUT TO THE PLAYGROUND TO PLAY TILL THE BELL RINGS AT 9.10 A.M. AFTER SCHOOL ASSEMBLY WE SOMETIMES HAVE A TABLE TEST AND THEN LESSONS.AT 10.40 A.M. WE ALL GO OUT TO THE PLAYGROUD BECAUSE IT IS BREAKTIME. THEN WE GO BACK INTO CLASS AT 11.00 A.M. FOR ANOTHER LESSON WE DO MATHS OR ENGLISH.DINNER BREAK BIGINS AT 12.00 I HAVE SCHOOL DINNERS IN THE HALL. AFTER DINNER WE GO OUT TO THE PLAYGROUND UNTIL 1.15 P.M.THEN WE GO BACK INTO CLASS AND DO LESSONS OR ON A WEDNESDAY WE GO SWIMMING.WE WORK TILL 2.15 P.M. AND THEN IT IS BREAKTIME.WHEN BREAK IS FINNISHED WE DO SOME MORE LESSONS OR HAVE A GAME OF ROUNDERS TILL HOMETIME. AT 3.30 P.M. I
